inn1.comm: loosener to begin with, full outside off and Warner has to stretch out a bit to drive that past cover
brings it in line with the stumps and Warner pushes it inside out down the track
was that a chance? Inside edge, the ball dipped lowo to Dhoni's right and the ball just dropped short of his glove
a touch wide outside off and Ponting gets far across and shoulders arms
a touch wide again and he gets across and softly pats it
Ponting off the mark with a firm push down towards point, the fielder dives and has a shy at the batsman's end but Warner is quick
nice and straight and the ball hurries onto Ponting, clips him high on the pad but missing leg, stifled appeal
swings it back in a bit late and he softly clips it to the on side
comes round the wicket but he gives him width, Warner punches it well and beats the gap at cover, Tiwary does well to chase and pull it back before the rope, not sure who Tiwary's in for
lands it outside off and he's happy to leave it alone
nearly had Ponting there! He was fishing at one on the front foot that moved away, nearly grazed the face of the bat
he overpitches on middle and leg and Ponting shows the full face of the bat and merely pushes it through the line past mid-on
a bit too straight and Warner easily tucks it in front of midwicket
Lands it on a good length outside off and gets it to shape away, once again induces a false shot, beaten on the drive
goes back at the crease and slices it down towards point
nips it back inwards and he gets across his stumps and clips it towards midwicket
sliced off the back foot but straight to Rohit at short point, he's there in a catching position
fuller and angling in and Ponting clips it down to midwcket

the opening experiment fails for Ponting, Vinay does well to pitch it up on the off stump, moves it away slightly, Ponting drives inside out and spoons it Kohli at point, Ponting looked at bit awkward at the crease when he played that and the follow through too
keeps it on the off stump and he defends down the track
gets back at the crease and he defends to the off side
clipped away off the pads and well stopped at midwicket, Jadeja the man, India's have been sprightly in the field today
comes round the wicket and sprays it wide down the leg side
now it's an overstep! Oh well, Warner pats it square on the off side
Free Hot, oh excellent ball! Swinging in and landing on the blockhole near the leg stump, Warner edges it onto his pads, doesn't cost a thing
keeps it outside off and Warner watchfully leaves it alone
lands it on middle and off and he defends with soft hands down the track
punched off the front foot and well fielded at cover by Raina

elegantly clipped by Clarke, he fetches it from the off stump, takes a pace forward and chips that over midwicket, Kohli makes a good attempt to slide and cut that off but the ball rolls back to the rope
fullish in length on the off stump and he drives through the line, the ball is just wide of the non-strike and well wide of mid-off
nearly three out of three, Zaheer gives him width and Clarke slices it wide of point, Vinay has a lot of ground to cover from third man but he times the slide well
gets behind the line and defends with soft hands
squeezes out a full delivery to the off side
keeps it a shade outside the off stump and he leaves it alone
a bit too straight and he shuffles and clips him behind square on the on side
too wide and on a good length, not the best way to bowl on this placid surface, Clarke reaches out and thrashes it wide of the covers
Vinay overcompensates by bowling it too full and on the pads, nice use of the wrists and he effortlessly clips it wide of midwicket
safely leaves it alone outside the off stump
fullish on the pads and he clips it straight to mid-on
gets across and knocks it down the pitch
slower delivery, he opens the face and runs it down to third man
Zaheer comes round the wicket and ensures he doesn't give him room, Clarke gets  behind and defends solidly
slightly slower in pace and he angles it inwards, he pats it to the off side
shot! It wasn't that bad a ball, short of a length on the body and at good pace,  Clarke swivels and played a short-arm pull and it races past square leg
ouch! Rohit dives at short point and the ball lobs off his hand and hits him flush on the side of the jaw
Warner gives that a crack, punishes the width provided by Vinay, reaches out and punches it past extra cover
good length outside off and steers it to the off side
crisp timing from Warner, Vinay gives him width outside off and he didn't try to hit it too hard, worked it well wide of short point
nips back in and he pushes it to the off side
gets on the front foot and steers it to the off side
continues round the wicket to Clarke, he punches it firmly down the track
steers it towards point and tells his partner to wait
angles in on the pads and he shuffles and tucks him to the deep on the on side, there's protection there now
clips a length delivery down to midwicket and tells Clarke to wait
nervy moment for Warner as an inside edge hits his pads and sneaks past the stumps
clips it across the line to the on side
continues round the wicket, he defends on the front foot
once again he gets an inside edge to his pads

Communication Breakdown! Warner punches it down to cover point, fails to bisect the packed off side field, Rohit is sharp, he gathers and throws to the bowler's end, Clarke was away for the run and was already near the striker's end, both were running to the same end but Warner was in no-man's land as he decided to sacrifice his wicket
Clarke stays back and defends
goes back and across and defends solidly again
fullish in length and clipped down to mid-on
Run Forrest Run! Peter Forrest is off the mark in ODIs with a push to the covers
tossed up on middle and leg, he clips it towards midwicket
pushed softly to the off side
tossed up more outside off and he watchfully leaves it alone
gets forward and drives to the off side
pushes it down the pitch, end of a quiet over
fullish in length on middle and leg and softly clipped to mid-on
swings in late and he jams it out firmly towards cover
fires it on the pads and he clips it straight to mid-on
Umesh has been bowling in the mid-140s, comes forward and pushes a full delivery to mid-off
jams out a full delivery down to mid-on
punched off the front foot and he can't beat the packed off-side field, 149.9 kph
cuts it down to cover point
chips down the track and pushes it wide of mid-off
shuffles and clips it down to deep square leg
slower through the air and defended with soft hands
comes down the pitch and nearly yorks himself, flicks it late to the on side
good length on the off stump and he slices it down to point
stands a bit wide of the leg stump, Forrest nicely punches it but straight to the off side ring
shot! Fractionally short, Forrest had a hint of width to work with outside off, he went forward, bent his knee slightly and square cut it wide of the diving point fielder
that was quick, at 150, he stays back and defends
this one kicked up a bit and caught him off guard, manages to fend it away
148 kph, swings it in and bowls full, he clips it wide of mid-on and the fielder dives and cuts it off
gets forward and pushes it to the off side

you couldn't hear the sound of bat on ball, that was how crisp that was, chips down the track and he lofts it over the sightscreen, that was one of the cleaner hits over the sightscreen says Ian Chappell. The straight boundaries are long here
he drives it wide of mid-off
stays back and he clips it behind square
gets forward and defends to the off side
stays back and defends
148 kph, on a good length and he stays back and defends to the off side
149 kph,  pace like fire, hurries him on the back foot to defend
148 kph, fuller in length and he pushes it on the front foot towards mid-off
slower ball and Forrest clips it to midwicket
that was a real fizzer at 149 kph, Forrest did extremely well to bend his knee and sway out of the way
148 kph, he stays back and pushes this one to cover
comes round the wicket, Clarke clips it just past midwicket
tossed up outside off and he pushes it through the line at mid-off
tossed up on middle and leg and he clips it behind square
gets forward and defends with soft hands
takes a pace down the track, checks his shot and defends
tossed up on middle and leg, he works it to midwicket
stays back at the crease and he defends down the track
stays back at the crease and thumps it firmly but can't beat point
goes back at the crease and cuts it down to sweeper cover
145 kph, tucks it off his pads and beats midwicket

not sure what Clarke was trying to do but full credit to the bowler for this, he saw Clarke making room and taking a few paces down and cleverly slipped in a slower ball at 121 kph, Clarke had to change his shot and tap it away with soft hands, had to really stretch out and he ended up chopping it onto his stumps
Yadav runs in from round the wicket but doesn't bang it in short, slides it down the leg side at 146kph
149.9kph, drifts on the body and he shuffles and clips him down to short square leg
beats him in flight and clips his pads and he appeals, but he 's bowling round the wicket
lovely shot! Twinkle-toes Forrest emulates Clarke by chipping down the track and driving crisply past mid-off and cover
now he goes on the back foot, goes forward and adjusts quickly on seeing the shorter length, cuts past point and finds the gap with precision
tossed up and he pushes it down to long-on
stays back and defends
151 kph, Forrest chops it to the off side and charges off, tip and run, excellent running
continues round the wicket, sprays it on the pads and he clips it behind square on the on side
148.9 kph, bowls it nice and straight and he ensures he doesn't give him room, clipped to short midwicket
another quick one on the body and he clips it down to short midwicket again
145 kph, fuller in length and he stays back to defend
very good stuff from Yadav, good length and straight, tucks him up for room as he defends
tossed up on middle and leg, he pushes it down to the off side
punches it wide of long-off
drives and Jadeja does well to dive and deflect it
Forrest continues to impress against the spinners, he rocks back on seeing the shorter length, thumps it past two bemused fielders at cover and the two fielders at the deep gave up as well
drives him to long-off
this one really kicks up on him, he stays back and fends it off to the off side
short and wide and he cuts it down to sweeper cover
149 kph, he thrashes it to the off side again, short and wide
slower ball on the pads and he tries to run it round the corner, the keeper picks it up
driven towards mid-on and he has to hurry because an alert Vinay Kumar dived forward and hit the stumps with the flick
drives towards mid-off
tossed up and he worked it across the line to the on side
chips down the track and checks his shot to mid-off
comes down the track and he pushes it down to long-on
gets on his knee and whips it to the on side and the ball drops short of Raina at midwicket
makes room and ends up chopping it down the track
swipes it across the line down to deep square leg
tossed up and he pushes it down to long-on
waits for the ball to come on to him before working it away down to mid-on
short outside off and Forrest chops it to long-off
tossed up and he drives to sweeper cover
tossed up and he flicks it down to midwicket
chips down the track and he clips it down to long-on
length ball and pushes it down to long-on
punches it down to the on side
chips down the track and Ashwin fields
stays back and cuts it down to point
drives straight to  extra cover
tossed up outside off and he defends forward
stays back and clips it towards midwicket
clips it behind square  for a single
tries to pull but fails to make proper contact
take that! After missing out on the previous ball, he rocks back and clubs a short delivery over square leg, the umpire had to take cover
chips down the track to a flighted delivery and lofts it over midwicket, there was a fielder patrolling the area but it was wide of him
Hussey in sublime touch! He fetches a ball from the off stump, gets on his knee and slogs cleanly over square leg and nearly fetches the maximum
cuts it down to point
chops it back to the bowler
stays back and punches it to mid-off
a bit short, he goes back and cuts
gets forward and turns it down to square leg
gets forward and drives down the track
goes back at the crease and punches it down the track
flighted on the stumps and he clips it down to midwicket
pushes it wide of point for a single
pushes it down to swepeer cover and he puts pressure on the fielder for the second run
goes back and cuts it behind point
extra turn and he gently nudges it down to fine leg
appeal for a run-out at the bowler's end but Forrest is safe, he was sent bac, Dhoni gathered and threw it to Ashwin, the 3rd umpire takes a look
goes back and punches it to long-off
goes back and punches it to long-off
comes down the pitch and drives through the line to long-off
forces it down the pitch back to the bowler
keeps the long-off fielder busy again, he comes forward and drives through the line
Rohit drops it a bit short and he rocks back and cuts to the deep on the off side
shuffles and he works it with the turn down to fine leg
he drops it too short and he pulls off the front foot to deep square leg
forces it down to long-on
chips down the track and he pushes it down to long-on
tries to pull him down to fine leg but fails to make proper contact
on the off stump and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
gives him width and Forrest goes to 49 with a cut towards deep point
nicely flicked away by Hussey just wide of mid-on for a single
tries to steer that past point but Rohit is alert in that position as he dives and saves a single
steered straight to point again
punched off the back foot past mid-off and that's Forrest's debut 50! Clarke was correct about this guy
chips down the track and drives him down towards long-off
makes a bit of room and slices it wide of point and down to third man
tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
the long straight boundaries don't deter Forrest, tossed up outside off and he chips down the track and has a free swing over wide long-off
pushes it back to the bowler
full on middle and leg and pushed to long-on
drills it back to the bowler
punched down to long-on
waits for the turn and clips it down to short fine leg
gets forward and drives inside out down to long-off
takes a single down to long-on, they're setting themselves up for the Powerplay here
Zaheer comes round the wicket and drifts on the pads and he clips it down to fine leg
Zaheer tries to mix things up by bowling closer to the stumps, there's a sound as the ball passes Hussey, Dhoni takes it on the full and there's an appeal
nearly chops it back onto the stumps, Zaheer gets the ball to nip back in
cuts it down to gully for a single
goes across the stumps and chips it in the air and just manages to clear midwicket
slower ball and he pushes it down to long-off
144 kph, he drops it short and wide and Forrest rolls his wrists and slaps  it wide of point
good comeback by Yadav as he gets it to come back in and cramps him for room, he pushes it down the track

miscued! Forrest tries to push it in the Powerplay, pulls a short delivery and fails to control it, Vinay runs forward from deep square leg and takes it, that ends a very impressive debut innings by Forrest
short and wide and he cuts him hard down to deep point for a couple
full delivery and he clips it down to midwicket
short and wide again and he cuts  but can't beat point
drifts on the pads and he clips him down to fine leg for a single
angles in on the pads and he stays back and defends
stays beside the line and he places it down to cover point
Hussey squirts out a full delivery on the pads down to mid-on an brings up his fifty!
drops it short and he's ready for the pull, places it along the ground to the on side
punches it down to Ashwin at long-off to keep the strike
Yadav gives him a bit of width and he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
full outside off and he drives wide of cover for a single
streaky boundary by Christain as he gets an inside edge that sneaks past the stumps and beats short fine leg
nice comeback by Yadav as he sprays in the yorker and Christian does well to dig it out
fullish delivery outside off and he places it wide of extra cover

he thrashes a full and quick delivery wide of extra cover, Kohli sprints and gives it everything to cut it off and he nearly saves the boundary but the ball rolls back towards the rope, he appears to have hurt his ankle on the dive, splendid attempt nevertheless
clips it wide of midwicket for a coulpe
gets across and works it behind square for a couple
Christian's keeping busy, clipped off the pads wide of square leg and puts pressure on Kohli by going for the second
gets across and mistimes the drive to cover
good slower ball, he shapes to pull but plays too early and misses
comes round the wicket, he gets across and clips it towards cover
nips it back inwards and he works it to the on side
good slower ball, a bit too early on the shot and he ends up mistiming it to the on side
full and he drives wide of Umesh at mid-off
tries to slap that to long-off and he flat -bats that back to the bowler
he lofts over the bowler's head and Sehwag does well to chase that from mid-on and slide and cut it off
drives it down to long-on
stays back and punches it down the track
chops it to the off side
gets on his knee and paddles it down to fine leg
comes down the track and pushes it back to the bowler
turns it down to backward square leg for a single
tossed up, he drives to long-off for a single
works it down to midwicket
shuffles and clips him to deep square, they run the first quickly
drives him through the line to long-on
gets forward and pushes it towards point
stabs it wide of point and they communicate well and take the single
moves right across his stumps and tries to paddle it away, the ball hits Dhoni flush on the knee
goes back and makes room and cuts to mid-off
tossed up on middle and leg and he pushes it down to long-on
stays back and cuts it down to point
skilfully done by Hussey, he makes a bit of room and chips down the track, lofts inside out over extra cover
flatter delivery and he works it wide of cover
gets forward and defends to the off side
cuts it wide of point and Zaheer does well to cut it off and keep it down to a single
slower ball from the back of the hand, too short as well, he fetches it from outside off and flat-bats it to deep midwicket
steers it to point and Hussey decides to head back to his crease, Rohit doesn't throw because there was nobody backing up
well bowled, Vinay sees the batsman making room and advancing so drops it short and on the body, Hussey uneasily pats it to cover
fuller delivery and he squirts it wide of cover
Hussey goes for a wild swish outside off but plays too early and misses
Zaheer too drops it short on seeing the batsman advance, he tucks it to the on side and has to settle for a single

good reflexes from Sehwag! Zaheer fires it full on the pads and Hussey tries to work that away past square leg with his wrists, he chips it and Sehwag at square leg has to time his dive well to his right, which he does, and takes it an inch from the ground
Wade watches it through to the keeper
gets across and drops it down the track back to the bowler
tries to squeeze it past the gap at point but the fielders are alert
strays on the pads and he clips it to the on side
140.7 kph, Wade gets a short, quick one rising over his face and he swivels gets a top edge over the keeper
145.7 kph, pacy one on the pads and the ball clips his pads and rolls to the on side
hurries him for pace and he mistimes it towards cover point
third man was too square and Umesh fired that too full and wide, on the blockhole and Christian merely squirted it to the boundary
beats him for pace with another full delivery outside off
down the leg side and he shapes to pull down to fine leg and nearly gloves it to Dhoni, who appeals, it flicked his shirt
Wade fails to squeeze out a yorker outside off
squeezes out a yorker down to mid-on, well bowled
Zaheer's keeping them in check with his yorkers, he squeezes it back to the bowler
moves across his stumps and whips a full delivery across the line to deep midwicket
another yorker outside off and he fails to get something out of it, excellent stuff from Zaheer
comes round the wicket and Zaheer mixes it up well and bangs it in short, Christian tries to slash it over third man but the bounce is too good for him
good yorker and Wade just manages to push it past a diving Vinay who took Christian out along with him, Christain was setting off but tripped and fell as Vinay made contact
Christian goes across and tries to paddle it to fine leg but gets a top edge which clears Dhoni
Wade backs away and tries to carve it over extra cover but mistimes it

good work by Jadeja, Christian works it down to long-on and tries to put pressure on Jadeja by pushing for the second run, the throw is accurate to Dhoni and the batsman is well short, the third umpire takes a look
drives it to the off side
Wade makes room and tries to pierce the off side field but can't get it past Raina at point
142.5 kph, pushes a full delivery down to mid-off and Rohit takes aim at the bowler's end and misses
Wade continues to look scratchy, swivels and tries to pull but he's beaten for pace and the bal dribbles to the on side
Harris shapes to pull and the ball hits him flush on the stomach and rolls to the off side
Wade backs away and chops it to the off side, he's struggling
147.7 kph, clips his pads and rolls to the leg side
148 kph, forces a low full toss towards mid-off and Rohit misfields
comes round the wicket, Wade backs away and gets an inside edge past the stumps
Wade's scratchy knock ends, he backs away to cart that over the on side and misses a slower ball, hits the leg stump, Wade is very frustrated for not making the most of the conditions
punches it down to sweeper cover for a single
was he swatting a fly there? The slower bouncer, took an eternity to reach him, he made room and swatted it to the on side, mistimed it
makes room and lofts it wide of long-off

McKay moves right across and tries to slog him, he doesn't pick the slower ball and misses it, Harris was already off the blocks so McKay had to hurry, Dhoni correctly threw it to Vinay who flicked it at the stumps, the ball deflected off the stumps and the third umpire took a look, he was a yard short

inn2.comm: Gambhir chases a ball moving away wide of the off stump, bad ball and bad shot
much better, he gets across and leaves it alone to the keeper
134.5 kph, Harris gets good carry through to the keeper, Gambhir is careful outside the off stump
goes back to being circumspect again, the width is tempting him and he chases at one rooted to the crease
gets nicely beside it this time and steers it to the off side
brilliance from Ponting at point to stop that, nicely punched off the back foot, looked like a boundary
clipped off the hips straight towards square leg
trapped on the pads and Starc appeals but that looked like missing the leg stump, kept a touch lower than expected
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
fuller in length and on middle and leg, times it nicely off the back foot and mid-on fields
punched off the back foot and it's in the air but Hussey did well to dive to his left, Sehwag had to scamper that single
Gambhir takes the initiative by stepping down the track and smashing it along the turf past the gap between mid-off and cover
Harris overpitches and Sehwag doesn't have to do much at all, at the crease, minimal foot movement and he got the meat of the bat behind the ball to beat cover
bangs it in short down the leg side and the umpire calls it one bouncer for the over
superbly timed! A fraction short and it was moving away, he rides the bounce well, punches it crisply past a diving Hussey at point, third man was square but it was too quick for him
tries to repeat the previous shot but he's beaten
drifts on the pads and he tucks it off his legs down to midwicket
angles on the pads and he rolls his wrists and places it down to fine leg
lofts him over mid-off but he doesn't quite time it well enough
hurries him up for pace as he tries to work it to the on side, clips his pads and rolls away
short of a length and he nicely tucks it away straight to square leg
traps him on the pads again as he tries to whip it away to the on side but outside the line of the leg stump, Gambhir not really at ease with Starc's incoming ball
that's a good response! Short ball fetched from outside the off stump, he rode the bounce well and slapped it across the line wide of square leg
gets beside the line and steers it to the off side
Sehwag always gives you that chance with the odd slash outside off
gets across and clips it down towards midwcket
gets across and taps it with soft hands to the off side
pitches outside leg and hits his pads and rolls away to the off side, they take a leg bye
goes back and punches it down towards cover
slightly short and he punches it towards cover
crisp shot, Starc pitches up outside off and Gambhir leans onto the front foot drive and places it in the gap at cover, very well timed and a good attempt to try and pull it back
cuts wide of point but third man's square
goes back and punches it towards cover
gets right across his stumps but changes his shot and pushes it down towards mid-off
really full and wide and Sehwag stays at the crease and slashes one-handed at third man
stays back and clips it down to mid-on
that was an absolute peach which kicked up off a good length and sneaks past his glove
fuller in length and he clips it wide of midwicket
drops it with soft hands to the off side and tells Sehwag to wait
goes back at the crease and softly pats it to the off side
opens the face of the bat and pushes it softly towards point
slightly short and he arches backwards and dabs it down to third man
length ball is clubbed by Sehwag towards mid-on, on the bounce to the fielder
pitched up and just outside off, driven crisply towards extra cover and a sharp single is taken
slants it down the leg side, Wade dives acrobatically to collect that
length ball on the stumps, pushed to the off side for a quick single
a slower bouncer from Starc, Sehwag was tricked by that one, he was looking to swipe it towards midwicket but didn't spot the change of pace and was easily beaten
no feet from Sehwag as he punches the ball towards cover, straight at the fielder, Gambhir initially wants one but gets back to the non-striker's end after a chorus of No's

there is a tiny gap in the crowded field around point, Sehwag manages to find it, it was a wide delivery from Starc, Sehwag lashes that for four, there a dive in the outfield but the fielder can't stop the ball
defended towards extra cover from the crease
close call for Sehwag, pitched up, on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on by Gambhir, who screamed 'No' early, Sehwag had already set off, was slow to turn, a direct hit and Sehwag was a goner
streaky from Gambhir, a shortish ball outside off, takes the edge and flies high over slip, Clarke leaps but he had no chance, four chancy runs
lovely hit from Gambhir, a full ball is caressed past extra cover by Gambhir, timing and placement perfect, the 50 is up for India. 50 for 0 isn't a scoreline India have seen often on this tour
much shorter from Harris, Gambhir stays back and pokes the ball towards point

the opening stand is over, Sehwag is gone, an ordinary delivery from McKay, short of length ball that was slanting down the leg side, should have been easily helped away, instead Sehwag closes the face too early, leading edge results, and the ball pops up for a simple catch to point, a sign of the poor form he is in
a length ball on the stumps, carefully defended to the off side
blocked off the front foot to the left of the bowler
length ball outside off, left alone by Kohli
short of length ball just outside off, defended from the crease by Kohli
length ball on off stump, punched confidently towards mid-on
fullish delivery outside off and he defends to the off side
drops it with soft hands to the off side and thinks of a single
excellent calling and running this time, Kohli knew as soon as Gambhir dropped it  behind the pitch that there was a single for the taking
spooned in the air and it flies past the vacant gully region
seemed risky at first, Gambhir knew there was just a slip in place so he edged that deliberately where a third slip would have been, third man does well to cut it off
drifts on the pads and he closes the face of the bat and clips it to square leg
full outside off and he steers it down to third man
nicely punched off the back foot straight to short extra cover
shuffles across and nicely clips it away down to square leg, good shots but straight to the fielders
drops it with soft hands to the off side and sets off quickly
clips him down to square leg
gives him a bit of width and he chops that down to point
Kohli gets excited seeing that width but the ball is pitched up and he nearly feathers an outside edge to the keeper
full and swinging in, he clips it off the toe of the bat down to mid-on
they're doing the singles well, quick shuffle and clip towards mid-on and he calls quickly
another quick single, Gambhir clips a full delivery across the line towards midwicket and Kohli was off the blocks
fullish in length outside off and he drives straight to mid-off, can't beat the fielder
drops it towards mid-off and sets off but Gambhir wisely stays put, Warner fails to gather and ends up colliding with Gambhir on the move
comes round the wicket and gives him width, he cuts to deep point
good length outside off and he punches it down to point
gets beside the line and punches it down to point
good length on middle and leg and he clips him down towards square leg
excellent running again! Warner picked it up at short cover and Wade was ready to collect the throw  but Kohli was quicker than everyone
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
gets across his stumps and he clips him down to deep square leg
short and wide outside off and he reaches out and dabs it to third man
lovely straight drive, punches a half volley down the ground and the umpire does well to get out of the way
gets forward and pushes it down to sweeper cover
shuffles and clips it down to the vacant spaces at deep square leg, he runs the first one well
a little short of a length outside the off stump and he drives square and Ponting slides and fumbles at point
Gambhir nearly falls for the trap, Clarke had placed himself at a short third man position and Gambhir dabbed it straight to him
drops it with soft hands to the off side
angles on the pads and he clips him down towards fine leg
steers it down to Ponting at cover point, Ponting took a  blow on the hand after that earlier misfield
gets beside the line and steers it down to deep cover
punched down the pitch but straight to McKay
gets across his stumps and defends with soft hands
Gambhir tries to break the blues by giving the charge but he ends up mistiming it to mid-off
too wide down the leg side and Gambhir can't chase that
chips it in the air wide of mid-on, a short midwicket would have swallowed that
reaches out to a length delivery and places it down to sweeper cover
good running again, drops it in front of him and Kohli sets off
slower ball and he taps it down to cover
sprays that full and wide and he smacks that off the front foot to deep cover
Kohli chips it in the air down to deep square leg but he can afford to do that because the field is spread out
short and wide and he cuts him down to third man
lovely pull,  a fraction short and Kohli fetches that from outside off and pulls it past square leg
takes a single down towards long-on
just when Kohli was looking set, he tries to go over the top of the off side, stays at the crease and doesn't get the elevation, Forrest takes it at sweeper cover
good length outside the off stump and he plays to sweeper cover
opens the face of the bat and dabs him down to third man
dabs it down towards gully
brings up his fifty with a gentle nudge around the corner off his pads, the short fine leg was up and McKay was made to pay for his error
gets his front pad across and shoulders arms
gets across and defends to the off side
pushes this one towards cover point
shuffles and clips him off the pads down to deep square leg
angles it in the body and he clips him down towards square leg
tucks him up for room and he pats it back to the bowler
short of a length and he punches it down to sweeper cover
gives him width outside the off stump, he makes room and cuts to sweeper cover
knocks it off his pads to the on side
punches it down towards cover
gets to the pitch of the ball and drives to long-off
low full toss and he punches it hard down to long-off
tossed up outside off and he jams it to short midwicket
drops the ball short and he rocks back and slices it in the air to deep point, safe shot
tucks it off his pads to the on side
defends and the ball spins back towards Wade who tries to back-flick it onto the stumps
drifts down the leg side and Gambhir tries to paddle it away but fails to make contact
chipped in the air but Rohit comes in the way
clips it with the turn to the leg side
works it down to square leg
close call! Gambhir clipped it wide of the keeper and set off, Wade gathers and takes aim at the stumps in one motion but the throw is wide
gets forward and defends to the off side
pushes it down to long-on
clips it with the turn to square leg
clips it down to midwicket and there's confusion in the calling
drives it towards long-on
goes back and slaps it to the off side
clips him easily down to square leg
comes down the track and works him down towards long-on
opens the face of the bat and glides it wide of cover
clips it in front of midwicket
works it wide of point
goes back and clips him down to midwicket
gets forward and knocks it wide of cover
flatter delivery that skids through, he rocks back and slaps it to sweeper cover
tries to work it to the on side but ends up pushing it down the track
chips down the track and he works it to long-on
drives outside off towards point
dabs it towards short third man and he hurries the single
stays back and punches it past the diving Doherty
drifts on the pads and he clips him down to the on side
a fraction short and he dabs it to third man
full delivery on the pads and he knocks it back towards the bowler
Rohit gets an inside edge past the stumps as he shapes to place it on the off side
gets a big across and knocks it to the leg side
stays beside the line and steers it straight to point
clipped softly towards short square leg and Warner in all  his enthusiasm to pick up and throw misfields
goes back and punches it to sweeper cover
chips down the track and clips it with ease down to deep midwicket
stays back and punches it down to short third man
comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
punches it towards point and a rare misfield by Ponting who moves to his left
nice placement, bisects the gap between point and short third man
Rohit really bludgeoned that! He dropped it short and Rohot swiveled and clubbed that several rows back over deep square leg
fuller delivery and he pushes it down to sweeper cover
drops it with soft hands down the pitch
full and swinging in, he squirts it out to mid-on
tries to nudge it off his hips and it rolls to the on side
down the pitch and pulled in front of square, Hussey does well to slide and cut it off at deep midwicket
stays back and defends down the track
an ungainly pull and he gets an inside edge towards deep square leg
stays back and clips it across the line to deep square leg
classic cut from Rohit, Christian was generous with his width, Rohit didn't try to hit it too hard, just sliced it and the fielder at sweeper cover dived in vain
a little short in length and he goes back to defend
gets behind the line and punches it down to mid-off
effortlessly punches it off the back foot down to long-off
easily done, too full on the pads, all he had to do was get across his stumps slightly and gently clip it past the diving keeper down to fine leg
clips it down to midwicket
goes back at the crease and defends
stays at the crease and punches it off the back foot past the big gap on the off side
angles it across the left-hander and he leaves it alone to the keeper
goes back and chops it down to point
slower ball on the pads and he whips him wide of midwicket, another easy run
opens the face of the bat and steers him down to third man
gives him width and he has the time to dab it down to third man

Rohit's thrown it away! Very similar to Kohli's dismissal, he tries to loft through the line off a length ball, he skies it to Starc who runs forward from long-on. Rohit probably didn't realise it takes a lot more power to clear the straight boundaries
shuffles and clips him down to deep square leg
such deliveries will ease the pressure off India, juicy half volley on the pads and Raina just gets a faint nudge and it's enough to beat fine leg
tucks it down to square leg for a single
a touch full and he opens the face of the bat and dabs it down to third man
Dropped Tough one for Warner, Gambhir spoons it over short cover and warner leaps and gets a hand to it
rides the width and steers him down to third man
the short ball tests Raina a bit but he manages to keep it down and place it to the legside
gets across and taps it with soft hands to the off side
the angle across the left-hander doesn't trouble the left-hander as he easily steers it square on the off side
gets an inside edge onto the pads but Christian appeals

the bowling change works! Lands it on leg, Gambhir had already shuffled across the stumps a bit and had exposed the leg stump, the ball nipped in slightly and hit his pads, the umpire reckoned that was hitting leg, on seeing the pitch map, the ball looked like pitching on the border of the leg stump line
leaves it alone to the keeper
gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
Dhoni watchfully leaves this alone as well to the keeper
goes back at the crease and taps it towards cover and gets off the mark
opens the face of the bat and steers it to the off side behind point
drifts on the pads and he clips him down towards fine leg
he pushes it down towards cover, the off side is quite packed
stays back and pats it down towards point, he's struggling to get it away
gets well forward and drives towards cover
gets it to move back in and Dhoni watchfully leaves it alone
bit short of a length and he clips it away behind square
Dhoni's watchful again outside the off stump
now Dhoni tries to chase one leaving the right-hander, he's rooted to the crease and is beaten
Dhoni's watchful again outside the off stump
once again McKay tests him out with his wide outside off stump line, Dhoni looks very circumspect
short and wide outside off and he slashes and misses, this Power play is getting wasted
gets forward and clips him down to midwicket
tries to punch it through but can't beat mid-off, the struggle continues
he manages to pierce it past the off side infield this time, sweeper cover fumbles a bit but it doesn't cost anything
gets across and taps it to the off side
clips it in front of mid-on and has to hurry that single, he dives but he's safe from the direct hit
turns it wide of mid-on and they take the first one quickly, excellent running, India need this kind of energy
strays really wide down the leg side and wide called
shuffles and clips it down towards square leg
swings it on the pads and he clips it across the line but can't beat midwicket
swings across the line and he's hit on the pads but he may have got an inside edge, McKay appeals
too straight, pitched up on the pads and he stylishly flicks it in the air over midwicket, finally India make use of the vacant gaps
pulls straight to Clarke at midwicket
good length outside off and he taps it to point
full delivery and he thuds it hard down towards short extra cover
the ball kicks up on him from a good length and he ends up stabbing at it
he cuts that towards point to get off the strike
drives straight to extra cover and Warner fumbles
short of a length outside the off stump and he punches it down to sweeper cover
tossed up outside the off stump and it's too wide
tossed up outside off and driven down to cover
beaten in flight and there's an appeal for a stumping, Dhoni ensured his back foot was back
gets forward and pushes it down towards long-off
gets on his knee and sweeps him down to fine leg
fires that in the blockhole outside off and he squeezes it out down to third man
gives the charge and drives down to sweeper cover, India need to find the bigger gaps
overthrows! Flicked towards square leg and Doherty has a shy at the bowler's end and the throw is wide of the stumps
clipped down to deep midwicket and there could have been two there but Raina was happy with one
fuller delivery and defended back to the bowler
forces it through the line down to long-off
goes right across his stumps and clips him down to long-on
tucked away off the pads behind square on the on side and Dhoni does really well by taking the first run quickly, good running
gets across and knocks it to the on side
Raina finally steps down the track and targets his favourite area, he gets to the pitch of the ball and slams it over deep midwicket
gets forward and drives wide of cover
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
drives hard but can't beat cover
Harris fumbles at point and that allows a single
drifts on the pads and he shuffles and clips him wide of square leg
on the blockhole outside off and he squeezes it back to the bowler
mistimes it towards midwicket
bowls it full outside off and he forces it down to long-off
gets beside the line and steers it down towards sweeper cover
on the blockhole and he squeezes it out towards cover
low full toss and he chips down the track and places it to sweeper cover
tossed up outside the off stump and he jams it down to long-off
reaches out to a full and wide delivery and places it just wide of sweeper cover
Doherty gets away with a low full toss which only costs him a single to long-off
comes down the pitch and clips a low full toss down to midwicket and that's the 50 stand, off 64 balls
drives square on the off side and there's a fumble by Forrest which allows a couple
he strays wide outside the off stump from round the wicket, drives on the up down to sweeper cover
Dhoni scampers a single towards point and he just manages to make his ground before Ponting's direct hit, they take an overthrow off the deflection, the third umpire takes a look
drives but can't beat short extra cover, Dhoni's not been his most convincing through the off side
jams out a full delivery past the bowler and down to long-off
in the slot and Raina capitalised on that, it was a touch full, Raina stayed at the crease and thrashed it over extra cover
fullish in length on the off stump and pounded down the ground to long-off

well is that a twist? Credit to the bowler here, he tossed it up and invited Raina to give him the charge, Raina almost ended up yorking himself, the ball went straight through the gap between bat and pad and thudded the stumps
doesn't take him long to get off the mark, down to long-on
terrible throw by Harris! Could have had Jadeja run-out, Dhoni pushed it to cover point and Jadeja was a long way out, Harris underarmed it and lobbed it up it was way too high
driven back to the bowler
full outside off and he squirts it out to third man for a single
he clips a full toss down to deep midwicket and they take a couple
stabs it to cover and takes a quick single and a direct hit would have had Dhoni in trouble
Jadeja lofts inside out and the fielder at deep extra cover managed to get around it
well played, the ball is on the pads and Jadeja swivels and forces it past short fine leg and Starc does really well to chase and cut it off
jams out a full delivery down towards long-on
mistimes the pull in front of square and they scamper a single there as well
drags a full delivery from the off stump and places it to long-on, Jadeja hurries him for the second and they make it
low full toss and Jadeja slams it hard  down to deep midwicket, just the one
makes room and squeezes out a full and faster one down to Harris at cover point
scoops it over extra cover and Jadeja just fails to find the rope
another twist! Doherty bowls this one a bit flatter, Jadeja gets on his knee and slogs and tries to clear deep midwicket, straight down Ponting's throat
a dot ball! Dhoni makes room and can only slap it to extra cover
and yet another dot ball! Dhoni thuds it right back at Doherty to his left, just four off this over
Ashwin goes right across his stumps and tries to wham it over short fine leg, close to the off stump
clears the front leg and mistimes the shot to midwicket, only a single!
he delivers just when India needed a big hit! Stays at the crease  and picks a length delivery from outside off and carts it high over wide long-on
it's a waist-high no-ball! McKay lets that slip, Dhoni clubbed that and was caught at deep square leg, the umpire called it a no-ball immediatrely

India have pulled it off at the nick of time! Almost! Dhoni pulls a slower ball behind square on the on side and the fielder, I think it was Warner, dived at the boundary and cut it off but India had time to take the third
